title: [Crisostomo's Armory]
[Crisostomo's Magic Shoppe]
[Crisostomo's General Store]
description: The broad sweep of the wooden floor is interrupted by a worn rug.  Halfway to the wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A long mistwood counter and a splintered cargo crate are pushed close together in the back of the shop.
